wikipedia_page.main: Shirley Clifford Atchley  (14 January 1871 – 20 June 1936) was a British diplomat and botanist.

response: Russell married Athenais Atchley, daughter of Shirley Clifford Atchley in 1920.
*Shirley Clifford Atchley  Translator at His Majesty's Legation at Athens.
*Shirley Clifford Atchley, Local First Secretary at His Majesty's Legation at Athens
